## About Rocket.Chat

Rocket.Chat represents the complete open-source solution for team collaboration and communication, offering enterprise-grade messaging capabilities combined with extensive customization options across both macOS and Windows platforms. This powerful collaboration platform provides real-time communication tools that enable teams to work together efficiently regardless of their physical location or preferred operating system. The flexible architecture combined with robust security features makes Rocket.Chat the preferred choice for businesses, educational institutions, and communities seeking to maintain control over their communication infrastructure while benefiting from modern collaboration features.

The platform's comprehensive feature set includes end-to-end encryption for secure communications, extensive integration capabilities with popular productivity tools, and customizable automation through bots and workflows. Whether you're coordinating remote teams, facilitating classroom discussions, providing customer support, or managing community engagement, Rocket.Chat delivers reliable performance with the scalability needed for organizations of all sizes. The cross-platform compatibility ensures seamless communication experiences whether team members are using macOS workstations or Windows computers, while the self-hosting options provide complete data sovereignty and customization flexibility for organizations with specific security or compliance requirements.

---

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended for large teams)
- 300MB available storage space for application and cached data
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- Stable internet connection for real-time communication

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture recommended)
- 4GB RAM (8GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 300MB available storage space
- .NET Framework 4.8 or later
- Network connectivity for team collaboration features

**Community Engagement** - Public channels and community management for user groups

**Crisis Communication** - Emergency alerts and coordinated response for critical situations
